CustomField.description:
Google Street View Image, link to Google Map for extended research.
Was: IF(ISBLANK(Google_Street_View_URL__c), '', HYPERLINK(Google_Map_URL__c, (IMAGE(Google_Street_View_URL__c, "Picture", 300, 600))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Click on image to go to Google Map and Street View
CustomField.label: Google Street View
